highlights.description: Add typed ports for workflow data flow, runtime configuration, and support for new platforms (Gemini CLI, ADK Go, CrewAI, AutoGen)

added.description: Task and TaskType for agent task definitions
Port and PortType for typed workflow inputs/outputs
DeploymentMode enum (single-process, multi-process, distributed, serverless)
RuntimeConfig, StepRuntime, RetryPolicy for workflow execution
ObservabilityConfig for tracing, metrics, and logging
GeminiCLIConfig for Google Gemini CLI Assistant
ADKGoConfig for Google Agent Development Kit (Go)
CrewAIConfig for CrewAI multi-agent framework
AutoGenConfig for Microsoft AutoGen framework
DockerComposeConfig for local Docker deployment
Requires field on Agent for external tool dependencies
Tasks field on Agent for task definitions

documentation.description: Add Deployment Modes and Runtime Configuration sections to README
Add JSON Schema Guidelines for Go Compatibility section

highlights.description: Rename Check to TaskResult for consistency with multi-agent-spec task terminology

changed.description: Rename Checks field to Tasks in AgentResult and TeamSection
Add backward compatibility alias Check = TaskResult

documentation.description: Add specs/ directory structure convention to README

highlights.description: Add DAG-aware topological sorting for team reports based on step dependencies

added.description: TeamReport.SortByDAG() method using Kahn's algorithm
DependsOn field on TeamSection for DAG edges
Alphabetical ordering at each DAG level for deterministic output

highlights.description: Add team status report IR and renderer for NASA-style Go/No-Go validation reports

added.description: Status type with GO, WARN, NO-GO, SKIP constants
Check struct for individual validation results
AgentResult struct for agent outputs with inputs/outputs
TeamSection struct for report sections
TeamReport struct with project, version, phase, teams
Renderer for ASCII box-drawing report output
ComputeStatus, IsGo, FinalMessage helper methods
AggregateResults for combining AgentResults into TeamReport

documentation.description: Add Installation section with Go SDK tagging notes to README

highlights.description: Initial release of Go SDK for multi-agent-spec with type definitions and platform mappings

added.description: Agent struct with Name, Description, Model, Tools, Skills, Dependencies, Instructions
Team struct with Name, Version, Agents, Orchestrator, Workflow, Context
Deployment struct with Team and Targets
Model constants (haiku, sonnet, opus)
Tool constants (WebSearch, WebFetch, Read, Write, Glob, Grep, Bash, Edit, Task)
Platform constants for supported deployment targets
Platform-specific config structs (ClaudeCode, KiroCLI, AWSAgentCore, Kubernetes)
Model and tool mapping functions for cross-platform translation
Builder pattern methods (NewAgent, WithModel, WithTools, etc.)
